name: Wild Derby Riding - Horse Race
description:
Wild Derby Horse Racing is an awesome racing game for horse riding lovers. Wanna ride a horse? Join the real world of racing with your best horses in the field. Go to ride and challenge different riders.

You can boost your speed and stamina according to your requirement. Stadium is full to crowd and all of them are waiting for you to finish your goals at first position. But be careful there are lot of hurdles in the path. you have to avoid those hurdles.

You can ride a horse, horse riding is a perfect thing. Get your horse training to jump different obstacles / barriers and their performance is very good. We are giving you a platform from where you can enjoy horse riding in this horse racing game. True sports is in enjoying real environment. This derby horse has to go through various obstacles and finish fast.

Features:

- Realistic 3d graphics for derby horse
- Boost and walk mode enabled.
- Simple and intuitive controls.
- Real animated effects.
